com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.china.constants

? ChinaStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.china.constants.ChinaStyle

  • public class ChinaStyle
extends java.lang.Object

    ChinaStyle provides easy access to Chinese map style URLs. The styles included here are professionally designed by the Mapbox team.

    To load a Chinese map style, pass a style URL into ChinaMapView#setStyleUrl(String)
    ???????:
    0.4.0
    ????:
    ChinaMapView#setStyleUrl(String)

    • ?????

      ??? 
      ?????? ????
      static interface  ChinaStyle.ChinaStyleUrl
      Indicates the which styles URLs are acceptable as method parameters.
      static interface  ChinaStyle.ChinaStyleVersion
      Indicates the which style version numbers are acceptable as method parameters.

      Subtle light backdrop for data visualizations.

      A complete basemap, perfect for incorporating your own data.

      • MAPBOX_STREETS_CHINESE

        public static final java.lang.String MAPBOX_STREETS_CHINESE
        A complete basemap, perfect for incorporating your own data. Using this constant means your map style will always use the latest version and may change as we improve the style.
        ???????:
        0.4.0
        ????:
        ?????

      • MAPBOX_LIGHT_CHINESE

        public static final java.lang.String MAPBOX_LIGHT_CHINESE
        Subtle light backdrop for data visualizations. Using this constant means your map style will always use the latest version and may change as we improve the style.

      • specificChinaStyleVersion

        public static java.lang.String specificChinaStyleVersion(java.lang.String chineseStyleUrl,
                                                         int desiredVersion)
        Retrieve a certain version of a Chinese map style.
        ??:
        chineseStyleUrl - the Chinese map style
        desiredVersion - the desired version number
        ??:
        the Chinese map style of a certain version

        * @since 1.0.0
